title: Replicability Crisis in Science?
text: Replicability Crisis in Science? is one of the Specialist Courses organized from the Department of Statistical Sciences (University of Padova). The course has been proposed for the AY 2023/24 to the PhD students of the XXXIX cycle.

title: Replicability Crisis in Science?
text:
Monday 8th June 2024

9:00 - 12:00

Branden Fitelson - What is a Replication?

Paper: Machery (2020)



Giovanni Parmigiani - Probability of Replication

Paper: Miller (2009)




14:30 - 16:30

Filippo Gambarota - Tools for Open Science

title: Replicability Crisis in Science?
text:
Tuesday 9th June 2024

9:00 - 12:00

Branden Fitelson - What is a Replication?

Paper: Fletcher (2021)



Giovanni Parmigiani - Probability of Replication

Paper: Mathur & VanderWeele (2020)




14:30 - 16:30

Filippo Gambarota - R tools and examples for Measures of Replication

title: Replicability Crisis in Science?
text:
Wednesday 10th June 2024

9:00 - 12:00

Branden Fitelson - Replicability in Psychology

Paper: Nosek et al. (2022)



Giovanni Parmigiani - Replicability in Cancer Science

Paper: Errington et al. (2021)




14:30 - 16:30

Filippo Gambarota - Multiverse and meta-analysis
